name: dropDMG
description: DropDMG is an application that creates DMG files for macOS. It uses the dropdmg command line utility to combine your packaged macOS application into a DMG for distribution. You can optionally specify a layout and license file that you have created in DropDMG.

name: Inno Setup
description: Inno Setup is a free installer system for Windows available at http://www.jrsoftware.org/isinfo.php. This helper fills in a template .iss file with the files and folders in your application each time you package your application. The resulting file is placed in the package folder alongside the windows folder.
